    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        moves the pipes to the left by their velocity. They are reset if they go out of the view. Y axis is random. X is end of the display

      • updateRectangles

        public void updateRectangles()
        update the rectangles around pipes which are used when calculation collisions
